EmailTemplate.name: 2014 Customer 4.5 Launch Webinar - 12:00 pm.Follow up - No-shows
EmailTemplate.subject: See a recording of VMTurbo’s v4.5 release webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Sorry we missed you at VMTurbo's v4.5 release webinar last week. You can watch the recorded version at your convenience <http://bit.ly/LscRHK>.
We're happy to answer any of your questions: email sales@vmturbo.com or support@vmturbo.com.
We look forward to seeing you at one of our upcoming events again soon.
Sincerely, The VMTurbo Team Marketo, Inc. 901 Mariners Island Blvd., San Francisco, CA, 94404
Contact Us <#>
